author: CBS News
title: As virus hits South America, Brazil's president mocks threat
description: In Ecuador's largest city, nearly 2,000 bodies have reportedly been collected for burial, some in cardboard caskets​.
content: South America is struggling to stop the coronavirus from spreading, and cases in countries like Brazil and Ecuador are likely being underreported, researchers say. Brazil has reported more than 25,000 cases, but researchers believe the real number could be 10… [+1463 chars]
